00008 class CNewVisionDoc;
00009 
00010 // Cylinder is a Cylinder (paralellopiped) in image coordinates 
00011 // representing static store fixtures on the floor that might occlude the object being tracked
00012 // p1,p2,p3 represent the base of the fixture (z=0), while p4 gives the height
00013 class Cylinder : public Obstacle {
00014     DECLARE_DYNAMIC(Cylinder)
00015 public:
00016     CvPoint3D32f p1, p2; // base and top center points
00017     double R;
00018     Cylinder(void);
00019     Cylinder(CvPoint2D32f p1, CNewVisionDoc* doc);
00020     Cylinder(const Cylinder&);
00021     Cylinder& operator=(const Cylinder& that);
00022     ~Cylinder(void);
00023 
00024     void GetOccludedFloorArea(CvSeq* points);
00025     CvPoint3D32f GetCenter();
00026 
00027     bool Move(CvPoint3D32f p);
00028     bool Move1(CvPoint2D32f p);
00029     bool Move2(CvPoint2D32f p);
00030     bool Move3(CvPoint2D32f p);
00031     bool Move4(CvPoint2D32f p);
00032 
00033     void DrawFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color); 
00034     void DrawFloor(CDC* pDC, int ox, int oy, CPen* pen);
00035     void DrawFrame(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color);
00036     void DrawFrame(CDC* pDC , int ox, int oy, CPen* pen);
00037     
00038     virtual double GetDistanceFromCamera(); // distance from camera center in centimeters
00039     virtual void RasterizeFrame(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color=CV_RGB(255,255,255)); 
00040     virtual void RasterizeFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color=CV_RGB(255,255,255)); 
00041     void Serialize( CArchive& archive );
00042     
00043     bool IsFramePointIn(CvPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent);
00044     bool IsFloorPointIn(CvPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent);
00045 };
00046 #endif // !defined( CYLINDER_H )
